definitions.body: fat, rich, of food, Ge 49:20 (poem in J), Is 30:23 (+ [[דָּשֵׁן]]), Hb Hab 1:16 (‖); of land, festile Nu 13:20 (E), Ne 9:25, Ne 9:35, pasturage Ez Eze 34:14, 1Ch 4:40. (1Sa 15:9 v. [[מִשְׁנֶה]]
stout, robust, of men Ju Jdg 3:29 (‖[[אִישׁ חַיִל ]]; v. GFM); f. coll. (fig. of flock) Ez Eze 34:16 (+ [[הַחֲזְקָהִ]]).
